texto: results of a software process assessment;  measuring software process effectiveness and improvement effectiveness;  identifying improvement actions aligned to business goals;  using the reference model in ISO/IEC TR 15504-2 as a framework for improvement;  cultural issues in the context of software process improvement;  dealing with management issues for software process improvement.
